recipe.name: Chamomile Tea
recipe.desc: Chamomile tea. It has a golden yellow color and a mild, slightly sweet, and floral taste. It is often consumed before bed to help promote relaxation and improve sleep quality.

recipe.name: Ginger Tea
recipe.desc: Ginger Tea. A popular herbal infusion made from the root of the ginger plant, known for its spicy and aromatic flavor. The resulting infusion has a warm and slightly pungent scent, with a hint of sweetness.

recipe.name: Black Tea
recipe.desc: Black Tea. Made from the leaves of the Camellia sinensis plant, which are withered, rolled, and oxidized before being dried and packaged. Black tea has a strong, bold flavor with a slightly bitter taste and a hint of sweetness.

recipe.name: Sleeping Potion
recipe.desc: Sleeping Potion. A powerful brew, made from a combination of herbs and teas. Anyone who consumes it will instantly fall into dreamless sleep until the effect wares off.

recipe.name: Speed Potion
recipe.desc: Speed Potion. A powerful brew, made from a combination of herbs and teas. Anyone who consumes it will instantly become 3x faster until the effect wares off.
